summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all - new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69 - year - old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis - obsessed couple to win the ' ultimate wedding ' . the winning duo - announced next monday - will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 .

explain: Priscilla Presley participates in the first wedding ceremony at a new chapel in Las Vegas, which is a partnership with the Today Show for an Elvis-themed contest that provides the winners with an exclusive "Ultimate Wedding" experience at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel at Westgate Hotel on April 23rd.

An Elvis-loving couple wins a competition to have their dream wedding at Graceland Wedding Chapel, which was launched by Priscilla Presley in collaboration with the Today show. The wedding will take place on April 23rd at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel at the Westgate Hotel.
The aspect states that the chapel, in which the contest winners will get married, was designed by Priscilla Presley and features artifacts related to Elvis Presley.
